message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, as you know it's worth a lot more to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $105 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value to you.  Let's make this deal happen!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I can offer $107 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
